name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Service Configuration
description: This is a repository of service configuration APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Google Service Management
apis.description: Google Service Management is an infrastructure service of Google Cloud Platform that manages other APIs and services, including Googles own Cloud Platform services and their APIs, and services created using Google Cloud Endpoints.
